title: How to Make Campanelle with Pesto and Shrimp

steps.headline: Boil 4 quarts of water in a large stockpot.
Add 2 TBSP of salt to water.
Add Pasta and stir every 2 minutes until pasta is cooked Al dente according to directions on box.
Add basil, pine nuts, parmesan, and garlic to food processor.
Blend while pouring olive oil through top spout of processor.
steps.description: Final product should have a smooth consistency and no large chunks.

steps.headline: Coat a shallow frying pan in extra virgin olive oil.
Set stove to medium high and heat oil for 2 minutes.
Add shrimp to pan once oil is hot.
Cook shrimp until pink and opaque.
Add sauce to pan to quickly heat up.
Pour sauce and shrimp mixture over pasta.

text: Cooking the Pasta Boil 4 quarts of water in a large stockpot.  Add 2 TBSP of salt to water.  Add Pasta and stir every 2 minutes until pasta is cooked Al dente according to directions on box. Strain pasta and set aside. Making the Sauce Add basil, pine nuts, parmesan, and garlic to food processor.  Blend while pouring olive oil through top spout of processor. Final product should have a smooth consistency and no large chunks. Preparing the Shrimp Coat a shallow frying pan in extra virgin olive oil.  Set stove to medium high and heat oil for 2 minutes.  Add shrimp to pan once oil is hot.  Cook shrimp until pink and opaque.  Add sauce to pan to quickly heat up.  Pour sauce and shrimp mixture over pasta.  Bon appetit!
